definitions.definition: A small bow , generally performed by a woman or a girl , where she crosses the shin of one leg behind the calf of her other leg and briefly bends her knees to lower her body in deference .
examples: I refused to make so much as a curtsey for the passing nobles, as I am a staunch egalitarian.

main_definition: A small bow , generally performed by a woman or a girl , where she crosses the shin of one leg behind the calf of her other leg and briefly bends her knees to lower her body in deference .
